# js-format-cnpj

Lib to format CNPJ

#### Javascript example:
```js
const cnpj = require('js-format-cnpj');  
console.log(cnpj.formatCNPJ("49623477000112"))
``` 
Output:
49.623.477/0001-12

#### Typescript example:
```ts 
import { formatCNPJ } from 'js-format-cnpj'
console.log(cnpj.formatCNPJ("49623477000112")
```

Output:
49.623.477/0001-12
